_sText:
My first zombie mod map!

This map is dark and foggy.  Not much lighting, as i wanted it to be dark, since most zombie maps are surprisingly well lit.  There is lighting in one of the buildings, a lightswitch triggers it.  There is also a light in the bunker leading to the sewer, again a switch triggers it. And finally there is another group of floodlights in the sewer that can be turned on with a switch as well.  I put a delay on how long before they can be toggled because i worried about some jackass flicking it on and off over and over, pissing everyone off. 

Apart from that its straight forward. 2 entrances to the camp, the main gate and the sewer, and 2 entrances to the sewer (from within the camp and in a bunker outside.)

a train will bring the players to the camp, although they can jump off whenever if they like.  havent tried it on a zombie server, so im hoping that everything fits together nicely.  there are plenty of hiding and hold-out spots so it should work just fine.

I didnt make the guard towers, but i cant remember the creator's name. and the buildings in the camp are from Half life 2.

anyways thats about it, give it a try and please let me know what you think!
